actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize travel and transportation allowances to certain members of the uniformed services in connection with leave.

summary.text: Authorizes travel and transportation allowances to members of the uniformed services who are stationed or assigned outside the 48 contiguous States, or returning from a restricted area in which dependents are not permitted. (Adds 37 U.S.C. 411b)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 37, United States Code, to authorize travel and transportation allowances to certain members of the uniformed services in connection with leave.
